description.en: A certain country long ago. A rare mermaid with transformed legs was brought to the castle, supposed to be presented to the king of a neighbouring country... But the prince who saw her suddenly said, "Would you like to be my princess?" A communal life starts from there! How will the love of these two people go?
description.ja:
昔々のとある国。一匹の人魚が城につれてこられた。脚が二股に分かれたその珍しい人魚は、隣国の王に贈呈される予定だという…だが、その人魚を見た王子は言った。「お前、俺の妃にならないか！」

そこから始まるまさかの共同生活！二人（匹）の恋の行方はいかに――！？
description.pt-br: Era uma vez, em um certo país. Uma sereia foi levada ao castelo. A estranha sereia com duas pernas iria ser entregue ao rei de um país vizinho... Mas quando o príncipe a viu, disse: "Você! Quer ser a minha princesa?!" E assim começa uma inesperada vida em comum! Como se amarão os dois (animais)? Uma comédia de amor de conto de fadas sobre duas pessoas que estão apaixonadas, começando, começando...

description.en: Hakobe Narumi is an expressionless high schooler known as Stoney. The highlight of his unnoticeable existence is following posts from the popular selfie poster "Efa" on social media. But it turns out "Efa" is his studious and popular classmate Mitsuha Koto?! The slightly erotic, adolescent, selfie, romantic comedy between an Iron Walled Selfie girl and a stone-faced boy begins!
description.ja: つねに無表情な能面高校生・箱部成海。クラスでも存在感激うすな彼の人生の楽しみは、SNSで人気のえっちな自撮り女子「えふぁ」の投稿を追いかけること。しかし、その「えふぁ」の正体が、真面目で誰からも好かれるクラスメイトの三葉琴であることを知ってしまいーー⁉︎鉄壁自撮り女子✖️能面男子のちょっとえっちな青春自撮りラブコメ開幕‼︎
description.ru: Хакобэ Наруми — невыразительный старшеклассник по прозвищу «Каменнолицый». Его незаметное существование состоит в том, что он следит за постами популярного эротического аккаунта «Эфа» в соцсетях. Но оказывается, что «Эфа» — это его одноклассница Мицуха Кото! Начинается слегка эротическая, подростковая, селфи-романтическая комедия между селфи-девочкой с железной стеной и парнем с каменным лицом!

description.en:
“You’re amazing for being alive another day!”

A Manga about an understanding girlfriend who rewards you with a “log-in bonus” every day.
description.pt-br:
“Você é incrível por estar vivo mais um dia!”

Um mangá sobre uma namorada compreensiva que recompensa você com um “bônus de login” todos os dias.

description.fr:
Il y a sept ans, divers sorts et malédictions sont soudainement apparus sur Internet et étaient considérés comme « réellement efficaces ».
« Jo Sammosa », un site Web devenu célèbre pour la vente d'outils occultes.
Depuis l’apparition de « Jo Sammosa », les incidents irréalistes se sont multipliés rapidement à divers endroits.

Dans le même temps, l’existence de "L’unité de contrôle des anomalies (connu sous le nom d’unité d’anomalie) », qui était considérée comme une légende urbaine même au sein de l’organisation policière, fait surface.

L'unité d'anomalie est devenue extrêmement occupée en raison de l'augmentation des cas impliquant des êtres surnaturels, et le directeur « Yoon Haru » travaille dur pour que l'équipe continue de fonctionner efficacement.

Un jour, « Gio », membre d'un département d'élite, rejoint le groupe.

Dès la première semaine de sa mission, Haru commence à avoir mal à la tête à cause de Gio, qui lui avoue avoir ses sentiments pour lui...

description.en:
Hiroki has a NEET Shut-in for an older sister, which leads him to always think "It's better to be a girl!"  
While taking care of his lazy self-centered sister Yui, he has finally had enough of her behaviour, and snaps at her. Griping about his sister, Hiroki mutters "I wish we weren't related", and accesses a mysterious website address.  
The website claims to allow you to enter the body of another person, as long as you are willing to make your own body available as well. Skeptical, Hiroki tries the service and winds up in the body of popular idol Mikuriya Mikuni.  
While spending time as Mikuni, Hiroki is involved in finding out a secret about her he'd rather not. At the same time, when seeking to go back to his own body, the person occupying it tells him something outrageous has just happened!  
What happened to Hiroki's body during the incident? And what is the idol Mikuni's big secret? Be witness to the suspense as these mysteries pile up!
description.pt: Kamiya Hiroki sempre pensou que as mulheres tinham uma vida mais fácil. Este pensamento foi reforçado pelo fato de sua irmã mais velha não fazer nada e jogar jogos durante todo o dia. Por que ele não poderia fazer o mesmo?. Ele queria se tornar uma mulher e ser preguiçoso como sua irmã. Depois de postar suas reclamações sobre sua irmã em seu blog, um leitor misterioso comenta, afirmando que existem maneiras de trocar corpos com os outros. Isso traria o sonho de Hiroki de se tornar uma mulher para a realidade. Infelizmente para Hiroki, trocar de corpo teve consequências inesperadas quando ele voltou para o seu próprio corpo.

description.en:
“The world will be destroyed if you have sex with the Demon King's daughter.”
After defeating the Demon King and saving the other world, the hero Takahiro returns to the real world. One day, Lilia, the daughter of the Demon King, suddenly arrives at Takahiro's place, where he leads a peaceful life. Takahiro braces himself for revenge, but her goal is to bear the strong Takahiro's child…!?
description.ja: 魔王を倒し異世界を救い、現実世界へと戻ってきた勇者・タカヒロ。平穏な生活を送るタカヒロの元へ、ある日突然魔王の娘・リリアがやってきた。 復讐かと身構えるタカヒロだが、彼女の狙いは強者であるタカヒロの子供を産むことで…！？

description.de: Himuro ist Büroangestellter und der Nachfahre einer Schneefrau. Wann immer seine Gefühle außer Kontrolle geraten, werden seine Kollegen seinen eisigen Kräften ausgesetzt. Jedoch besitzt er entgegen seiner frostigen Fähigkeiten eine sehr warmherzige und freundliche Persönlichkeit. Er liebt Katzen und Blumen, auch wenn er ihnen nicht zu nahe kommen kann. Diejenige, die seine Gefühle immer wieder aus der Bahn wirft und sein Herz zum Schmelzen bringt, ist seine stets gefasst wirkende und ein wenig exzentrische Kollegin Fuyutsuki. Obwohl alle Kollegen durch den stetigen Ausbruch seiner Kräfte von seinen Gefühlen für Fuyutsuki wissen, ist diese vollkommen ahnungslos. Dies hält Himuro jedoch nicht davon ab, zu versuchen, ihr Herz für sich zu gewinnen.
description.en:
A cute fluffy romance about the decendant of a yuki-onna who freezes the surrounding area every time he talks to his cute coworker.

x.5 chapters are longer than normal chapters and have more fluffy content, make sure to read them!

---
Himuro is a living descendant of the Snow Woman from Japanese folklore. But anytime he's around his eccentric yet kind colleague, Fuyutsuki-san, he totally freezes up! Despite the snowstorm of love that rages on in his heart, and her complete cluelessness, will he take a step forward or stay frozen in place?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Penguin Random House](https://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/series/FQP/the-ice-guy-and-the-cool-girl/)
description.fr:
Himuro est le descendant d'une yuki-onna, une femme des neiges. Par cette filiation, il plonge inconsciemment son entourage dans un environnement proche de l'Arctique lorsqu'il se concentre.

Pire encore, il passe pour un homme qu'il n'est pas : perçu comme insensible et au tempérament glacial, il est en réalité chaleureux, aime les chats et les fleurs.

Son état finit par attirer l'attention de sa collégue Fuyutsuki, dont il est secrètement amoureux. Himuro se montre alors déterminé à capturer le coeur de la jeune femme.
description.id: Romansa lembut yang lucu tentang dekendensi yuki-onna yang membekukan area sekitarnya setiap kali dia berbicara dengan rekan kerjanya yang imut.
description.it:
Il manga racconta la dolce storia d'amore tra due colleghi, la tranquilla e dolce Fuyutsuki-san e Himuro-kun, discendente di una donna delle nevi, che letteralmente ghiaccia ogni cosa attorno a lui.

---
Questa è la storia di Himuro, il discendente di una donna delle nevi, e della sua gentile seppur particolare collega Fuyutsuki... Anche se a prima vista possono sembrare due persone imperturbabili, entrambi sono in realtà molto impacciati quando si tratta di questioni di cuore; infatti l’amore che Himuro nutre nei confronti di Fuyutsuki imperversa nel suo animo come una bufera di neve, impedendogli di compiere il fatidico primo passo. Lei, d’altro canto, pare del tutto inconsapevole dei suoi stessi sentimenti...
description.ja: 現代を生きる雪女の末裔な氷室くんと、同僚のちょっとユニークで優しい冬月さん。一見、クールに見えつつも、二人は恋愛にすっごく不器用。冬月さんへの「好き」が心の内で吹雪のように吹き荒れる氷室くんはもう一歩を踏み出せず、一方の冬月さんは自分の感情に超が付くほど鈍感で!?　Twitter＆pixivで大人気!!　クールな二人のピュア過ぎラブコメディー♪　単行本だけの描き下ろしマンガ３編を収録☆
description.ko:
현대를 살아가는 설녀의 후예 히무로와 
약간 독특하면서도 상냥한 동료 후유츠키. 

언뜻 보면 쿨해보이는 두 사람이지만, 연애에 관해서는 놀랄 만큼 서투르다. 
후유츠키를 향한 ‘호감’이 마음속에서 눈보라처럼 몰아치자, 
히무로는 더 이상 한 걸음도 나아가지 못하고. 
후유츠키 역시도 자신의 감정에 둔감하기는 마찬가지였는데!? 

Twitter&pixiv에서 대인기!! 
쿨한 두 사람의 맑다 못해 투명한 러브 코미디♪ 

단행본만의 오리지널 에피소드 3편도 수록☆
description.pl: Poznajcie Himuro, żyjącego we współczesnej Japonii potomka yuki-onny, oraz jego nieco nietypową koleżankę z biurka obok, Fuyutsuki. Choć na pierwszy rzut oka oboje wydają się spokojni i opanowani, tak naprawdę w miłości nie do końca dobrze sobie radzą. Himuro, w którego sercu panuje miłosna zamieć, nie jest w stanie wykonać kolejnego kroku naprzód, zaś Fuyutsuki zdaje się nie zauważać jego starań…
description.ru: Милый пушистый роман о классной работнице и её, холодном как лёд, коллеге.
description.th:
ฮิมุโระคุง ชายหนุ่มผู้สืบเชื้อสายของสาวหิมะซึ่งใช้ชีวิตอยู่ในยุคปัจจุบัน 
และคุณฟุยุสึกิ เพื่อนร่วมงานสาวผู้อ่อนโยนและค่อนข้างไม่เหมือนใคร 
หากมองแค่ผิวเผิน หนุ่มสาวคู่นี้ก็ดูเป็นคนคูลๆ อยู่หรอก 
แต่พอเป็นเรื่องราวความรักแล้ว ทั้งสองกลับไม่เอาไหนซะเลย
ฮิมุโระคุงผู้ได้แต่เก็บความ "ชอบ" 
ที่มีต่อฟุยุสึกิไว้ในใจประหนึ่งพายุหิมะที่โหมกระหน่ำ 
โดยไม่กล้าก้าวออกไปเริ่มต้นสักที 
ส่วนฝ่ายคุณฟุยุสึกิเองก็ช่างความรู้สึกช้าไม่รู้ใจตัวเองเลย!?
description.tr: Sevimli iş arkadaşıyla her konuştuğunda çevreyi donduran ve Yuki-Onna'nın soyundan gelen adam hakkında sevimli, kabarık bir romantizm.
description.vi: Một câu chuyện tình yêu lãng mạn và dễ thương về một một cô nàng lạnh lùng và đồng nghiệp của cô ấy. Một câu chuyện tình yêu lãng mạn và dễ thương về một một cô nàng lạnh lùng và đồng nghiệp của cô ấy.
description.zh: 冰属性男子与酷酷女同事漫画 ，当雪男遇上酷酷女同事，办公室将掀起一场恋爱暴风雪！
description.pt-br: Himuro-kun, descendente de uma Yuki-onna moderna, acabou de chegar em seu novo trabalho, e acaba criando tempestades de neve e bonecos de neve quando é tomado por suas emoções e perde o controle. Sua paixão secreta por Fuyutsuki-san, uma colega de trabalho única, mas gentil, cresce tão forte que congela às vezes aqueles ao seu redor. Por outro lado, Fuyutsuki-san, que muitas vezes é visto como legal pelos outros, também está muito interessada no misterioso Himuro-kun. O relacionamento deles muda gradualmente através do trabalho diário e dos eventos da empresa, e eles também começam a passar tempo juntos, mas ambos são desajeitados no amor e não conseguem se aproximar…

altTitles.ja: ゆびさきと恋々

altTitles.th: ร้อยเรียงรักจากหัวใจ

description.de: Als die gehörlose Studentin Yuki eines Tages in Schwierigkeiten gerät, kommt ihr ihr Kommilitone Itsuomi zu Hilfe. Yuki ist fasziniert von Itsuomi, da er sie trotz ihres Handicaps wie einen ganz normalen Menschen behandelt. Durch ihn beginnt Yuki nicht nur eine neue Welt zu entdecken, sondern bekommt auch zum ersten Mal Herzklopfen.
description.en:
One day, Yuki, a university student, is in trouble when she is rescued by Itsuomi, a senior student at the same university. Even though Yuki is deaf due to a hearing impairment, Itsuomi is unfazed and treats her naturally. Yuki gradually becomes aware of Itsuomi, who makes her feel a new world...

---
Yuki is a typical college student, whose world revolves around her friends, social media, and the latest sales. But when a chance encounter on a train leads to her meeting friend-of-a-friend and fellow student Itsuomi-san, her world starts to widen. But even though Itsuomi-kun can speak three languages, sign language isn't one of them. Can the two learn to communicate the budding feelings between them?
description.es: La vida de Yuki, una universitaria con sordera, va a dar un vuelco cuando en su camino se cruce el joven Itsuomi, un muchacho que, a pesar de dominar varios idiomas, no conoce la lengua de signos japonesa. Itsuomi se interesa enseguida en Yuki y desea aprender la lengua de signos y, sobre todo, entrar en el mundo de ella. Signos de afecto es una historia de amor sobre la necesidad de la comunicación, sobre el aprendizaje de las diferencias y sobre la empatía.
description.fr:
Yuki est une étudiante qui, comme beaucoup d'autres, construit son quotidien autour de ses amis, des réseaux sociaux et de ce qu'elle aime. Mais quand un jour, dans le train, elle croise un jeune homme qui voyage à travers le monde, son univers va être chamboulé: ce dernier, bien que trilingue, ne connaît pas la langue des signes. Pourtant, très vite, il manifestera pour elle un intérêt bien particulier… Comment réagira-t-elle face à ce camarade d'université entreprenant et communicatif?

A sign of affection décrit avec pudeur et simplicité l'histoire d'amour entre une jeune femme sourde et un grand voyageur. à n'en pas douter, les personnages de ce manga ne manqueront pas de vous émouvoir!
description.it: Un giorno, in un momento di difficoltà, una studentessa universitaria di nome Yuki viene aiutata da Itsuomi, un senpai che frequenta il suo stesso istituto. Il giovane la tratta con grande naturalezza e non si scompone minimamente quando capisce che la ragazza è sorda. Ben presto, Yuki scoprirà di provare qualcosa per quel ragazzo, grazie al quale ha cominciato a percepire la realtà in maniera del tutto nuova...
description.ja: 女子大生の雪は、ある日困っているところを同じ大学の先輩・逸臣に助けてもらう。聴覚障がいがあって耳が聴こえない雪にも動じることなく、自然に接してくれる逸臣。自分に新しい世界を感じさせてくれる逸臣のことを雪は次第に意識し始めて…！？
description.ko: 여대생 유키는 어느날 곤란에 처해있을 때 같은 대학 선배인 이츠오미의 도움을 받는다. 청각장애가 있어 귀가 들리지 않는 유키에게도 동요하지 않고 자연스럽게 대해주는 이츠오미. 자신에게 새로운 세계를 느끼게 해준 이츠오미를 유키는 점점 의식하기 시작하는데…?!
description.pt: Yuki é uma típica estudante universitária que nasceu surda. Ela ama estar perto dos seus amigos, redes sociais e fazer compras. Certo dia, ela recebe ajuda de Itsuomi, um estudante da mesma universidade que ela, enquanto estava no metrô. A partir daí, nasce uma amizade entre eles que se torna cada vez mais especial. "Neste dia, Yuki sentiu o seu mundo mudar."
description.ru: Это нежная история о любви между глухонемой девушкой и парнем, говорящем на нескольких языках и облетевшем мир, как много они могут привнести и изменить в мирах друг друга? Ицуоми выручает Юки, оказывается, что они учатся в одном университете. Случайная встреча, заинтересованность, стремление, желание… Что же Юки постепенно осознает?..
description.th: วันหนึ่ง ขณะกำลังตกที่นั่งลำบาก ยูคิ นักศึกษาสาว ได้อิสึโอมิ รุ่นพี่นักศึกษามหา'ลัยเดียวกันช่วยไว้แม้ยูคิจะไม่ได้ยินเสียงเพราะมีความบกพร่องทางการได้ยินแต่อิสึมิก็ยังทำตัวปกติเป็นธรรมชาติกับเธออย่างใจเย็นจากนั้นยูคิก็เริ่มสนใจอิสึมิที่ช่วยตัวเองได้สัมผัสถึงโลกใบใหม่ขึ้นมา...!?
description.tr: Tüm dünyası arkadaşları, sosyal medyası ve çok satanları etrafında dönen Yuki, tipik bir üniversite öğrencisidir. Ancak bir trende, bir arkadaşının arkadaşı olan İtsuomi-san ile tanışma şansı olunca dünyası genişlemeye başlar. Fakat maalesef, her ne kadar İtsuomi-kun üç dil konuşabilse de, işaret dili onlardan biri değildir. İkisi, aralarındaki tomurcuklanan duyguları birbirine iletmeyi öğrenebilecek mi?
description.uk:
Юкі — студентка. Як і в багатьох інших ровесників, її повсякденне життя обертається навколо друзів, соцмереж, загалом усього, що їй подобається. Та якось вона випадково зустріла в потязі юнака, що любить подорожувати, і її світ перевернувся.

Іцуомі трилінгв, однак не знає японської мови жестів.

Проте незабаром він нею особливо зацікавиться… Як Юкі відреагує на цього впертого однокурсника, який прагне подружитися з нею? «A Sign of affection» лаконічно і просто описує історію кохання дівчини з порушенням слуху та завзятого мандрівника. Без сумніву, стосунки між героями цієї манґи неодмінно вас зворушать!
description.zh: 自從與你相遇之后，我的世界出現了改變的聲音。
description.pt-br:
Yuki é uma típica estudante universitária que nasceu surda, cujo mundo gira em torno de seus amigos, redes sociais e as últimas vendas. Mas quando um encontro casual em um trem a leva a conhecer o amigo de um amigo e colega estudante Itsuomi-san, seu mundo começa a se ampliar. Mas mesmo que Itsuomi-kun fale três línguas, a linguagem de sinais não é uma delas.  

Os dois podem aprender a comunicar os sentimentos que estão surgindo entre eles?

altTitles.ja: ラブひな

description.en:
Keitaro has had great difficulty getting into the university of his choice and no luck in meeting women. In a desperate effort to go into seclusion and study for his entrance exams, he volunteers to take over running his grandmother's hotel. His plans are ruined when he discovers that the "hotel" is actually an all-girls dormitory… and some serious distractions ensue.  
  
Won the 25nd Kodansha Manga Award for Best Shounen Manga.
description.pt-br: Love Hina conta a história de Keitarô Urashima, um rapaz de 20 anos de idade que já foi reprovado 3 vezes na Universidade de Tóquio, mas continua tentando por ter feito uma promessa a uma menina há 15 anos atrás. Ele se torna gerente de um alojamento feminino e acaba rodeado de garotas: Na maior parte do tempo Keitarô surpreende-as nuas sem querer (quase sempre em uma onsen, ou terma japonesa) e recebe golpes fenomenais de artes marciais. Os personagens de Love Hina são quase todos mulheres, porém um dos dois personagens principais é homem: isso mostra a inspiração da série em jogos simulador

altTitles.ja: 地雷なんですか？地原さん

altTitles.en: That Girl Is Cute… But Dangerous?

altTitles.pt-br: Aquela Garota é Bonita, Mas Perigosa?

description.en: The girl sitting next to me at the start of the new semester is the rumored "landmine" girl… but… is Chihara-san really the "landmine" that everyone says she is?
description.pt-br: A garota sentada ao meu lado no começo do novo semestre é a famosa Garota Perigosa, mas… a Chihara-san é mesmo o “Perigo” que todos dizem ser?

altTitles.ja: カウンタック

description.en: The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Sorayama Shun recieves a letter… from himself? The letter was from Shun 25 years ago for his future self. The letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. With loads of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.

title.en: Oshi no Bishoujo ni Kokuhaku sareru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 推しの美少女に告白される話

altTitles.en: I was Confessed to by my Beautiful Oshi

description.en: A yuri romcom manga where an otaku is confessed to by the pretty girl she declares as her oshi and they start dating.
description.ja: 推しの美少女に告白されて恋人になるラブコメ百合漫画です。
description.pt-br: Um romcom yuri onde uma estrela se confessa e vira uma namorada.

altTitles.ja: シュガシュガルーン

altTitles.th: แม่มดสาวหัวใจกุ๊กกิ๊ก

altTitles.hr: Slatke čarolije - avanture Chocole i Vanille

description.en:
From Del Rey:  
Little witch-girls Chocolat and Vanilla are best friends, but only one of them can be Queen of the Magic World. To determine who deserves the title, they must go to the Human World and enter a strange competition. Whoever attracts the most human boys wins! The girls had planned to be best friends forever, but both of them want to be Queen. Will their rivalry ruin their friendship?  
  
---
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for Children in 2005**

Based off of the critically acclaimed manga series Dragon Ball and Dragon Ball Z by Akira Toriyama, Young Jijii sets the stage for an excellent story and awesome adventures in the Dragon Ball Universe! Dragon Ball AF takes place three years after the end of Dragon Ball GT, following the adventures of the Z-Fighters and their fight against the all-mighty Lord Ize, son of Frieza!   
Dragon Ball AF has no affiliation with Akira Toriyama, Funamation, Toei Animation, or Fuji TV. Dragon Ball AF is a fan-made doujinshi created by Young Jijii and is made purely for entertainment.

title.en: Kimi to Warui Koto ga Shitai

altTitles.en: I Wanna Do Bad Things with You

altTitles.ja: 君と悪いことがしたい

description.en: Mamori Wataya is a tall but dark, plain, and shady high school girl. One day she meets Kanashi Fuji, who has a small, thin body and an evil-looking smile. A supporting character that no one can find and a villain that no one likes. This encounter turns their gray days blue.
description.ja: 背は高いけど地味で暗い脇役女子・まもり。嫌いだからとプールの水を抜く、学校一の嫌われ者の悪役男子・藤。悪いヤツの、不思議な強さに惹かれていったその先にあったのは、透き通るような青い日々。

altTitles.ja: ゴーアンゴー

description.en: Eigo Nitta, new student in Hoyo high school, is enrolled in the baseball team. Talented as fast pitcher but lacking in term of technique, Eigo Nitta aims to be the new pitcher of the team. He has to face many opponents, which creates an atmosphere of competition in the baseball team. However he and his teammates will have to find a way to solve the rivalry among the baseball team in order to go to Koshien tournament.

An older brother wanders the snowscape, looking for a cure.

Storyboarded August 2024. Edited September 2024.
The newest Japanese version has a few changes not in the English version, but it's all basic text stuff like [SPOILERS] adding in that guardians are created by witches or the old man warning of the guardians’ cunning lies.

altTitles.ja: 愛妻の裏アカ

altTitles.vi: Tài khoản bí mật của vợ yêu

description.vi:
Yamada Sosuke, người có một cô con gái đang học tiểu học, tình cờ xem được đoạn video ghi lại cảnh người có vẻ là vợ anh đang quan hệ t.ì.n.h d.ụ.c trong một tài khoản nặc danh. Hơn nữa, đoạn video còn được quay tại trường tiểu học mà con gái anh đang theo học.
Chủ tài khoản bí mật có thực sự là vợ anh không? Và cô ấy đang ngoại tình với ai?

altTitles.ja: 11番目のねこはねね

description.en:
Nene is a tiny waitress in a country where cat people live. She looks like a kitten, but she has a big dream and a secret...?

Let's start a thrilling life as a cat, as nene learns "cat-ness" from her seniors!
description.ja:
猫人の住む猫人國。

密入国は重罪だが、ねずみの子であるネネは、とある目標のためにリスクを覚悟でこの國へと忍び込んでいた。ネネは美猫揃いの雷雷茶楼で新入りとして働きながら、先輩たちから“猫らしさ”を学ぼうと奮闘するが…。

altTitles.ja: 恋するサイコの白雪くん

description.en:
I will kill everyone for your sake.

"Hey, I think I like you!" Shirayuki says with a smile.
Haruki endures relentless bullying from a trio of classmates. One day, a beautiful transfer student named Shirayuki suddenly approaches him and asks if he would date him if the bullying stopped. Haruki dismisses it as a joke. But the next day, one of his tormentors disappears. Then another. One thing's for sure—Shirayuki is a psychopath that lacks common sense and empathy.
description.es:
Mataré a todos por tu bien.

«¡Eh, creo que me gustas!» Shirayuki dice con una sonrisa.
Haruki soporta el acoso implacable de un grupo de compañeros de clase. Un día, un hermoso estudiante trasladado llamado Shirayuki se le acerca de repente y le pregunta si saldría con él si cesara el acoso. Haruki lo toma a broma. Pero al día siguiente, uno de sus acosadores desaparece, y luego otro y después otro. Una cosa es seguro: Shirayuki es una psicópata que carece de sentido común y empatía.
description.ja: 「僕、キミのこと好きになっちゃったかもしれない」そう言って白雪は微笑んだ。同級生３人に壮絶なイジメを受けていた晴樹は、ある日突然転校してきた美少年、白雪に「イジメがなくなったら僕と付き合ってくれる？」と持ち掛けられる。冗談だと聞き流した晴樹だったが、次の日から同級生が一人、また一人と姿を消していく。恋した転校生の白雪は、サイコパスだった。
description.vi:
Tôi sẽ giết tất cả mọi người vì cậu.

"Này, hình như tôi thích cậu mất rồi!" Shirayuki mỉm cười nói.
Haruki đã phải chịu đựng bắt nạt không ngớt bởi bộ ba bắt nạt cầm đầu lớp. Bổng một ngày, Shirayuki, một học sinh chuyển trường xinh đẹp đột nhiên xuất hiện tiếp cận Haruki và hỏi liệu cậu sẽ hẹn hò với cậu ấy nếu việc bắt nạt chấm dứt. Haruki bác bỏ và chỉ coi đó là trò đùa cho đến ngày hôm sau, một trong số kẻ bắt nạt biến mất và lần lượt từng người một. Chỉ có một điều chắc chắn rằng - Shirayuki là một tên tâm thần thiếu nhận thức thông thường và sự đồng cảm.
description.es-la:
Mataré a todos por tu bien.

«¡Eh, creo que me gustas!» Shirayuki dice con una sonrisa.
Haruki soporta el acoso implacable de un grupo de compañeros de clase. Un día, un hermoso estudiante trasladado llamado Shirayuki se le acerca de repente y le pregunta si saldría con él si cesara el acoso. Haruki lo toma a broma. Pero al día siguiente, uno de sus acosadores desaparece, y luego otro y después otro. Una cosa es seguro: Shirayuki es una psicópata que carece de sentido común y empatía.

altTitles.ja: とある魔術の禁書目録

description.ar:
تدور أحداث القصة في عالم حيث توجد قوى خارقة للطبيعة من العلم، ويوجد السحر من الدين  
  
في القصة، توما كاميجو هو طالب عادي في الثانوية بدرجات دراسية فظيعة وقوة تسمى كاسرة الأوهام. يمكن لـ كاسرة الأوهام إبطال أي قوة أخرى، لكنها تقوض أيضًا حظ كاميجو الجيد.   
.إن قوة كاسرة الأوهام الهائلة لا تُوصف حرفياً، لذا فإن كاميجو المسكين مصنّف في المستوى من ذوي المستوى صفر  
يصادف أنه قابل فتاة برداء أبيض تتدلى من شرفة نافذته. تقول الفتاة أن السَّحرةَ يطاردونها، ويكتشف كاميجو أن الفتاة هي راهبة في كنيسة إنجلترا التي استبدلت ذكرياتها بالقُوَّةِ ليتصبح "فهرس الكتُب المحرّمة" الـ .103,000 للكنيسة
description.en:
The story is set in a world where supernatural powers exist through science, and magic exists through religion.  
  
In the story, Touma Kamijou is an ordinary high school boy with terrible academic scores and a power called Imagine Breaker. Imagine Breaker can defeat any other power, but it also undermines Kamijou's own good luck. His Imagine Breaker's immense strength is literally immeasurable, so hapless Kamijou is listed at the supernatural level of 0. He happens to meet a girl in white hanging off his window balcony. The girl says she is being chased by sorcerers, and Kamijou learns that the girl is a Church of England nun whose memories have been forcibly replaced by Index-Librorum-Prohibitorum — the 103,000 forbidden texts of the Church.
description.ru:
Действие разворачивается в параллельном мире, где наука сплавлена с магией, и сверхъестественные способности давно никого не удивляют. Их носители делятся на две категории: эсперов, которые в результате направленной мутации получили один, пусть и мощный дар, и магов, которые могут быть слабее, но диапазон возможностей у них куда шире. Юных эсперов со всей Японии собирают в единый образовательный центр – город под названием Академия. Там и учится главный герой сериала Камидзё Тома. Дар у парня весьма странный: его правая рука – универсальный негатор, то есть, обнуляет любое парафизическое, магическое или божественное воздействие. А раз так, считает Тома, то и немногие крупицы счастья, посылаемые судьбой, до него просто не доходят, и вся его жизнь – полная невезуха (его любимая фраза). То на телефон наступит, то не с теми парнями свяжется, то обнаружит на перилах собственного балкона на редкость милое и голодное юное создание в костюме монашки…  
  
Адаптация ранобэ Toaru Majutsu no Index от Камати Кадзумы.|
description.pt-br: A história se passa em uma cidade acadêmica tecnologicamente avançada localizada na região oeste de Tóquio, onde alunos cientificamente avançados chamados "espers" estudam e desenvolvem habilidades especiais cuja fonte é a mente humana. Touma Kamijou é um estudante da Academia da Cidade cuja habilidade, a Imagine Breaker, possui o poder de anular quaisquer outros poderes usando sua mão direita, mas esse poder faz com que sua sorte também seja anulada, fazendo com que seja alvo de diversas furadas e problemas de azar. Um dia ele encontra uma jovem pendurada na grade de sua varanda...

title.en: Tough Gaiden - The Man Who Succeeds the Dragon

altTitles.en: The Man Who Succeeds The Dragon

altTitles.ja: TOUGH 龍を継ぐ男

altTitles.ja-ro: Tough Gaiden - Ryuu o Tsugu Otoko
Tough Gaiden - Ryuu wo Tsugu Otoko

description.en: The series starring one of illegitimate children of Kiryu Miyazawa, Ryuusei Nakamura. Years after Kiibo founded the new dojo, both him and Kiryu mysteriously disappeared. Ryuusei, after losing his mother to cancer, is set to find out about his birth father and his destiny as the evil dragon’s heir, but he is not the only one.
description.ru:
Третья часть саги Саруватари Тэцуи во вселенной "Жесткого". Что произошло после окончания второй части? Куда подевались некоторые старые герои? Где Киичи?  
Ответ на эти и множество других вопросов вы узнаете, начав читать "Жесткий: Наследник Дракона"!

altTitles.ja: デスラバ

description.en: Fujishirou Kousuke is an unfriendly and unsociable high school student. When he was younger, he made a promise with his childhood friend, Sayaka, that they would get married when they grew up. But one day, Kousuke is kidnapped and taken to a place that strangely resembled a prison. Little does he know, is this "prison" is guarded by a very voluptuous woman… Can Kousuke fulfill his promise to Sayaka?
description.es: Nuestro protagonista, Fujishirou Kousuke, es un chico de secundaria antipático y poco sociable. Desde que era chico, su amiga de la infancia, Sayaka, le prometió que cuando crecieran ambos contraerían matrimonio. Un día, Kousuke es secuestrado y llevado a un lugar totalmente fuera de lo común, parecido a una prisión… pero lo que no sabe, es que ésta "prisión" la resguardan mujeres… muy voluptuosas. ¿Podrá Kousuke mantenerse virgen para poder cumplir la promesa?
description.ru: Коске Фудзиcиро — недружелюбный и отстранённый ученик старшей школы. В детстве он пообещал своей подруге — Саяке, что когда они вырастут, то поженятся. Но однажды Коске похитили и доставили в место, которое странным образом напоминало тюрьму. Он ещё не догадывается, какая роскошная девушка заведует этой «тюрьмой»… Сможет ли Коске сдержать данное ей обещание?
description.vi: Fujishiro Kouki - một học sinh trung học ghét con gái - bị bắt cóc khi đang trên đường về nhà. Khi tỉnh lại, cậu thấy mình bị trói vào ghế và bị trêu chọc bởi một cô lính canh trẻ đẹp. Nơi đây là một nhà tù bí ẩn, nơi đàn ông bị nhốt trong chuồng và bị phụ nữ cai quản. Đây là đâu, mục đích của những mỹ nhân kia là gì? Đây là câu chuyện gay cấn pha lẫn khiêu gợi, với nhiều bí ẩn và sự tuyệt vọng mà những bí ẩn đó đem đến.

description.en:
Kang Hyunmoo is a dirt-poor man whose dreams of becoming a hunter were torn apart.

But one day, while he was dreaming of getting rich quick, something appeared in front of him… [Difficulty: Hell. You are entering the Star of Apocalypse.] “…What?” He’ll now be monopolizing items and skills in a future Earth overrun with monsters!
description.ko:
헌터를 꿈꿔볼 가능성도 짓밟힌 흙수저 채취꾼 강현무.
어느 날 일확천금을 꿈꾸며 잠든 그의 앞에 나타난 것은……?!
【난이도: 지옥 종말의 별에 진입합니다.】
“……뭐?”
괴물들로 넘쳐나는 미래의 지구에서 아이템도,
스킬도 나 혼자 독식한다!

altTitles.ja: 特別な中途半端

description.en:
"What does it mean to be dating exactly...?"

They're not friends.
But they're also not lovers.
It's a story about these two's half-relationship.

altTitles.vi: Bị Che Khuất Bởi Ánh Mặt Trời Lặn
Tà dương trong đôi mắt vô hồn

altTitles.ru: Закат, отражённый в её ледяном взгляде

description.en:
The witch Hildegar, who received the blessing of the Sun Goddess Karia, is known far and wide for her fearsome reputation.  
The Northerner Elkin, who lost his homeland, chases after the witch towards a nameless castle…
description.ko:
태양의 신 카리야의 가호를 받은 마녀 '힐데가르'.
고향을 잃은 북부인 '에르킨'은 마녀를 쫓아 이름 없는 성으로 향한다.

altTitles.ja: 不思議のまゆりさん

description.en:
Yuusuke, a 7th grader, is interested in his friend's older sister for various reasons.
The older sister, while a little strange, is a kind and caring girl.
She's mysterious but is popular with everyone.  
This is an ordinary comedy about Mayuri-san's mysterious everyday life.

altTitles.vi: Bắt nạt mình đi mà, nữ phản diện ơi!

altTitles.th: โปรดรังแกฉันทีคุณนางร้าย!

altTitles.zh-ro: Qǐng qīfù wǒ ba, è yì xiǎojiě!

altTitles.ru: Пожалуйста, поиздевайтесь надо мной, мисс Злодейка!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor, me humilhe, senhorita vilã!

altTitles.ar: !تنمرِ علي من فضلكِ يا أنسة الشر

altTitles.fr: Je vous en supplie madame l'antagoniste, Harcelez moi !

altTitles.ja: いじめてください、悪役令嬢様！

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~
description.zh-hk: 我，伊芳，轉生成為了乙女遊戲中的惡役千金。按照惡役文的套路來說，像我這種集萬千讀者厭惡於一身的角色，主要作用當然是欺負女主角、推進其和攻略角色的戀愛線了。可是——這個女主愛莎像是有什麼大病！都、都說了太近了，不要再靠過來了！愛莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺負是什麼呢~

description.en:
“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!

Sebuah karya baru dari author Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim

“Kenapa kamu terus tanya kalau kita pacaran? Kita cuma bergandengan tangan, kita nggak pacaran!!”

The Reincarnation of the Dark Master

altTitles.es-la: El demonio celestial no puede llevar una vida normal

description.en:
“Is this a mission I was sent on by the gods? Or is this just divine punishment?”

Baek Jung-hyeok, the Heavenly Demon of Murim, finds that he’s been reincarnated into the body of Roman Dimitri, the dim-witted son of a baron who’s obsessed with the luxuries of the aristocratic lifestyle. But with his new status, Jung-hyeok is ready to shake things up on the continent of Salamander.

Will the divine demon accomplish what he’s set out to do? And will he finally get the answers to this mysterious reincarnation?

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)
description.ko:
천마 백중혁, 드미트리 가문의 장남으로 눈을 뜨다.
드미트리의 얼간이, 차남에게 밀린 장남.
세간의 평판은 중요하지 않다.
천마, 아니, 로만 드미트리는 앞으로 평범하게 살 수 없다.
압도하는 천마 판타지!

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)
description.ru:
Демон Пэк Чун Хёк.
Некогда сильнейшая личность в Муриме умирает и обнаруживает себя в теле старшего сына дома Дмитрий. В теле человека, которого все называют дураком. Человека, который постоянно находится в тени своего младшего брата и которому глубоко плевать на мнение окружающих.
Но теперь, демон... Нет, Роман Дмитрий больше не сможет жить привычной жизнью.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)
description.uk: "Це місія, на яку мене послали боги? Чи це просто божественна кара?" Пек Чжун Хьок, божественний демон, повелитель Муріма, виявляє, що він реінкарнувався в тіло Романа Дмитровича, недоумкуватого сина барона, одержимого розкішшю аристократичного способу життя. Але з новим статусом Чжун Хьок готовий перевернути все на континенті Саламандр. Чи вдасться божественному демону досягти того, що він задумав? І чи отримає він нарешті відповіді на загадки цього таємничого перевтілення?
description.zh:
最强教主重生成异国废柴！
天不亡我！今生注定不凡！
武林最强天魔神教教主白钟赫生命自然终结后再睁眼发现自己成为了卢曼·德米特里，德米特里公认的傻子，且不如弟弟的德米特里长子。但外人的评价已经不重要。从此卢曼将不再浑浑噩噩，他的生活将会发生天翻地覆的变化，卢曼注定不再平凡！

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)
description.pt-br:
“O Demônio Celestial” Baek Joong-Hyuk abre os olhos como o filho mais velho da família Dimitry. Conhecido como o idiota da família, deixado de lado por causa do segundo filho. A opinião do mundo é irrelevante. “Demônio Celestial”, não, Roman Dimitry, não pode viver uma vida normal.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/tianmodebufanchongsheng/list?title_no=1809)

description.en: Sagami Gorou works in sales at Shounan Rubber Industries Co., Ltd. He is secretly harboring feelings for Musubu, a girl working in the company's integrated development department. And what this lovely young scientist is researching day and night are actually…
description.es-la: La historia sigue a Sagami Gouro de 24 años que empieza a trabajar en Industria Shounan Gum S.A, allí conocerá a la investigadora Musubu-san una chica que trabaja en el laboratorio de desarrollo de asistencia médica la "casa", su primer encuentro no será precisamente el esperado.
description.pt-br: Sagami Gorou trabalha no setor de vendas da Indústria de Borracha Shounan Ltda e tem guardado seus sentimentos por Musubu, uma garota que trabalha no departamento de desenvolvimento integrado, em segredo. O objeto de estudo desta adorável cientista, na verdade é…

title.en: I Became the Tutor of the Royal Twins

description.en:
An elementary school teacher in her past life, and a private tutor in the present.

Sarah Popo uses all her past life experiences in her second life.

She worked as a highly sought out tutor for aristocratic children.

Her goal is to be the owner of her own school!

Then, one day, the Emperor of the Empire sought her out.

“I want Miss Popo to be my siblings’ tutor.”

Water bombs, flour bombs, bug attacks.

What kind of offer did he make? To make her the tutor of a pair of notorious twins with all kinds of vicious pranks!

A very sweet one, of course.

The devil’s temptation shook Sarah’s life.
description.ko:
전생엔 초등교사, 현생엔 가정교사.
인생 2회 차인 세라 포포는 전생의 경험을 살려
귀족 자제들을 대상으로 고액 가정교사 일을 하는 중이었다.
목표는 건물주!

그러던 어느 날,
제국의 황제가 찾아왔다.

“포포 양께서 제 동생들의 가정교사를 맡아주면 좋겠어요.”

물 폭탄, 밀가루 폭탄, 벌레 공격 등
온갖 악질 장난은 다 한다고 악명이 자자한 쌍둥이 전하들의
가정교사가 되어 달라는 무시무시한 제안을 하기 위해!

달콤하기 짝이 없는 고액을 곁들인,
그 악마의 제안이 세라의 인생을 뒤흔들었다.

#환생물 #육아물
#전생도 현생도 교사 여주
#육아지옥에 빠진 황제 남주

altTitles.ja: 魔男のイチ

description.en: In this world, witches must hunt down their magic! Deep in the forest, the terrifying king of magic and the strongest witch are locked in deadly combat. But suddenly, a young boy joins the fray. His name is Ichi and he is just a hunter. But he has the power to flip the magic world upside down in this magic hunting fantasy epic!
description.ru: В этом мире ведьмы охотятся за своей магией! В глубине леса ужасающая маджика и сильнейшая ведьма схлестнулись в бою не на жизнь, а на смерть. Но вдруг к битве присоединяется молодой парнишка. Его зовут Ити, и он обычный охотник. Но у него есть сила перевернуть весь мир магии с ног на голову в этом эпохальном магическом фэнтези об охоте!
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, as bruxas devem caçar sua magia! Nas profundezas da floresta, o terrível rei da magia e a bruxa mais forte estão presos em um combate mortal. Mas, de repente, um jovem garoto se junta à briga. Seu nome é Ichi e ele é apenas um caçador. Mas ele tem o poder de virar o mundo mágico de cabeça para baixo neste épico de fantasia de caça mágica!

description.ar: كانت حياة ليزلي تستخدم دائما لتحسين شقيقتها إيلي بعد محاولة فاشلة لاستخراج السحر الأسود داخل ليزلي لنقله إلى إيلي تقرع ليزلي على باب الوحش دوقة وتنادي الدوقة لتبنيها
description.en:
Leslie’s life as the youngest daughter of the Sperado noble family was always used for the betterment of her sister, Eli, who is betrothed to the Crown Prince of the kingdom. After a failed attempt to extract the black magic within Leslie by sacrificing her to transfer it to Eli, Leslie knocks on the door of the monster Duchess Salvatore and, battered, bruised and desperate, pleads for the Duchess to adopt her?!

---

The Speràdo family line possesses a secret: shadow magic. But it's been 100 years since someone last wielded it. When Marquis Speràdo tries to sacrifice Leslie for her favored sister Ellie, little does he know that this awakens the power of darkness in her instead. To escape her family's greed and abuse, Leslie's out to make a deal with the Monstrous Duke: adopt her, and her powers will be at the duke's disposal. Will Leslie escape her parents' cruel grip, or succumb to their evil exploits?

---

**Note:** Chapter 130 is marked by the author as the end of the main story, and Chapters 131 to 150 is listed as an epilogue and flashback-origin story for Duchess Salvatore and her family.

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B4%B4%EB%AC%BC-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EA%B0%80%EC%9D%98-%EA%B3%84%EC%95%BD-%EA%B3%B5%EB%85%80/2336)
description.es: La vida de Leslie siendo la hija menor de la familia noble Sperado siempre se centró en ser usada para el beneficio de su hermana Eli, la cual es la prometida del Príncipe Heredero del reino. Tras un intento fallido de extraer la magia oscura dentro de Leslie por medio de un sacrificio para transferírsela a Eli, Leslie toca la puerta de la monstruosa Duquesa Salvatore y golpeada, moreteada y desesperada, ¡¿ y le pide a la Duquesa que la adopte?!
description.fr: Fille cadette d’une lignée aux pouvoirs extraordinaires, elle a été élevée dans l’ombre de sa soeur. Et le jour venu, elle découvre qu’elle doit périr pour elle! Pour échapper au sacrifice, une seule possibilité: se venger coûte que coûte de cette famille qui lui a tout pris. Quitte à s’allier avec une guerrière au sang de dragon.
description.it: La giovane Leslie è la figlia più giovane della nobile famiglia Sperado. Lo scopo della sua vita però è sempre stato quello di far vivere meglio la sorella, Ellie, promessa sposa del principe ereditario del regno. La sua famiglia l'ha cresciuta al solo scopo di agevolare la sorella, e un giorno la sacrifica per tentare di estrarre la magia delle ombre presente all'interno di Leslie per donarla alla sorella. Ma Leslie riesce a salvarsi la vita, solo momentaneamente... Riuscirà a cambiare il suo destino, o dovrà sacrificare la sua vita per il bene della sorella?
description.ko:
사랑받을 수 있다면 굶어도, 매를 맞아도 괜찮았다.
그러나 언니를 위한 제물로 불구덩이에 바쳐졌을 때, 그 기대는 산산조각이 났다.

"저를 입양해주세요"

불 속에서 간신히 살아남은 레슬리는 양녀로 삼을 아이를 찾고 있다는 공작을 찾아가

"제국, 아니 대륙 최고의 어둠술사를 얻으실 테니까요."

제국 유일의 공녀이자 어둠술사가 되기로 계약하는데

"레슬리, 이쪽으로 와"
"아니, 어제는 형이랑 먹었으니까 오늘은 둘째 오라버니랑 먹어야지"
"레슬리, 여기 네가 제일 좋아하는 젤리가 있단다."

졸지에 생긴 오빠들이 자기 옆에 앉아 달라며 아침마다 쟁탈전을 벌인다.
저기, 우리 그냥 계약 관계 아니었나요?
description.ru: Лесли всегда жила в угоду своей сестре, Эли. После неудачной попытки извлечь чёрную магию из превращения Лесли в Эли, Лесли стучится в дверь к Княгине чудовищ и умоляет её удочерить?!
description.tr: Leslie'nin hayatı her zaman kardeşi Eli'in iyileşmesi için kullanılmış. Kara büyüyü Leslie'den çıkarıp Elis'e transfer etme girişimi başarısız olduktan sonra, Leslie canavar Düşes'in kapısını çalar ve onu evlatlık edinmesi için yalvarır?!
description.uk: Народжена для того, щоб віддати життя за світле майбутнє сім'ї, Леслі завжди жила на догоду своїй сестрі Елі. Після невдалої спроби жертвопринесення для вилучення магії для Елі, дівчинка стукає в двері до Княгині Чудовиськ, благаючи удочерити її...
description.zh: 斯佩拉多家族的次女莱斯莉，她的人生完全是为了姐姐而活。莱斯莉忍受着来自家人的冷眼和虐待，以为可以换来关爱，直到父母为了让姐姐的力量暴增，而将她献祭。她决定逃离，并投靠整个帝国力量最强的“怪物公爵”，成为她的养女！ “请收养我吧，您将得到整个大陆最强大的黑暗魔法师！”

altTitles.vi: Các Hiệp sĩ trong khu Vực

altTitles.ja: エリアの騎士

description.en:
Aizawa Kakeru is an energetic and dedicated eighth grader who serves as the manager for his school’s football team. Though he was well known for being a talented player the previous year, an accident during one of his games caused Kakeru to vow never to play competitively again. Still passionate about the sport, Kakeru dreams of one day becoming a professional football trainer so that he can work alongside his older brother Suguru, the ace of the school team who has represented Japan in international competition.  
  
Link:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=13559) (anime).
description.pt-br: Suguru e Kakeru são dois irmãos que jogam futebol como ninguém. Suguru, aos 15 anos, já se tornou estrela da seleção japonesa; já Kakeru? bem, ele é tão talentoso quanto o irmão, mas decidiu abandonar os gramados e atuar só como auxiliar técnico depois de um acidente na oitava série. Claro, Suguru sabe do talento que o irmão tem e não se conforma com a decisão dele. O que poderá acontecer para que Kakeru mude de ideia e volte a ajudar o time de dentro de campo, onde seu irmão o espera??

altTitles.ja: 九龍ジェネリックロマンス

description.en:
The greatest labyrinth of the 20th century, a drama for working men and women in a town called Kowloon Walled City. A daily adult romance in a gentle dystopia.  
  
(…can a dystopia be gentle?)
description.ja: 此処は東洋の魔窟、九龍城砦。ノスタルジー溢れる人々が暮らし、街並みに過去・現在・未来が交差するディストピア。はたらく30代の男女の非日常で贈る日常と密かな想いと関係性をあざやかに描き出す理想的なラヴロマンスを貴方に――。
description.pt-br: O maior labirinto do século 20, um drama para homens e mulheres trabalhadores de uma cidade murada chamada Kowloon. Um romance adulto diário em uma distopia suave, uma nova vida tranquila.

altTitles.ja: ピープ

description.en: The popular gal who was my childhood friend is secretly uploading provocative selfies!? In his quest to uncover the secret of this popular girl, high school boy Riku discovers that his own deeply hidden emotions were being observed by someone else… A sweet yet suffocatingly intense blend of youth, love, and suspense.
description.ja: 幼なじみの人気ギャルは、過激な自撮りをアップする裏アカ女子！？人気者の秘密を探ろうとする男子高校生・陸は、逆に自分の隠していた心の底を、別の誰かに覗かれていたことを知る‥‥。溺れるほどに甘く、息もできないほど苦しい、青春×愛憎サスペンス。
description.es-la:
¿La chica popular que era mi amiga de la infancia está subiendo en secreto provocativos selfies de cosplay?
En su búsqueda por descubrir el secreto de esta chica popular, el chico de instituto Riku descubre que sus propias emociones, profundamente ocultas, estaban siendo observadas por otra persona...

Una dulce pero asfixiante mezcla de juventud, amor y suspenso.

altTitles.ja: 大ダーク

description.en:
A legend spreading among the whole universe says whoever collects Zaha Sanko's bones will have any kind of wish granted. 
Thus, he and his skeletal buddy Avakian will use their dark powers to fend off any murder attempts while they search through 
space for whoever put this curse on Sanko’s bones: killing them might end the madness.
description.ru: С самого детства Заха Санко боролся за свою жизнь. Как гласят легенды, если вы завладеете костями Захи Санко, вам исполнится любое желание. Вместе со своим другом Авакяном и силой тьмы Заха путешествует по космосу, чтобы найти человека, который проклял его кости и положил конец их жизни.

altTitles.ja: 嘘喰い

description.en:
There are gamblers out there who even bet their lives as ante. But to secure the integrity of these life-threatening gambles, a violent and powerful organization by the name of “Kakerou” referees these games as a neutral party. Follow Baku Madarame a.k.a. Usogui (The Lie Eater) as he gambles against maniacal opponents at games – such as Escape the Abandoned Building, Old Maid, and Hangman – to ultimately “out-gamble” and control the neutral organization of Kakerou itself.  


---

**Links:**  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14163)
description.ru:
Есть игроки, которые ставят на кон свою жизнь. Чтобы сохранить целостность таких смертельно-опасных игр, жестокая и могущественная организация «Кагэро» судит их, как нейтральная сторона.
Наш герой — Баку Мадарамэ, «Пожиратель лжи». Игрок, чья цель — переиграть и в конце взять под контроль саму нейтральную организацию «Кагэро».

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://mintmanga.live/pojiratel_lji))
description.es-la: Hay jugadores que incluso apuestan su vida como apuesta. Pero para asegurar la integridad de estas apuestas que ponen en peligro la vida, una violenta y poderosa organización llamada "Kakerou" arbitra estos juegos como parte neutral. Sigue a Baku Madarame, también conocido como Usogui (El Devorador de Mentiras), mientras se enfrenta a oponentes maníacos en juegos como "Escapar del Edificio Abandonado", "La Vieja Doncella" y "El Ahorcado", para acabar jugando más que la propia organización neutral de Kakerou

description.en:
Dennosuke Uchimura is a simple Salaryman, who one day is run over by an elderly lady on a scooter and left in the street to die. When he regained consciousness he discovers he was summoned to another world by the Demon King himself, who offers him a position as one of his Four Heavenly Kings. 

Can Dennosuke survive as a servant of the Demon King, and meet his expectations?

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi to Uchuu wo Aruku Tame ni

description.en:
Kobayashi is a Yankee who can neither study nor hold down a part-time job. One day, the eccentric Uno is transferred into his class. Uno saves Kobayashi from a questionable part-time job offered to him by a senior student, and the two become good friends after this incident. The more he learns about Uno, the more he is attracted to his lifestyle, and Kobayashi tries to change himself...

This is a story of friendship between two people who are complete opposites in terms of their inability to live normally, and who struggle to live happily despite the obstacles they face.

Heo Jeong-woo, a high school student who is bullied by a girl in his class for his weakness.
 
Han Bo-ra, a transfer student, comes to Jeong-woo's class, where he was spending his miserable days.

Jeong-woo feels a strong sense of déjà vu when he sees the child with straight black hair and stains on his legs. Sure enough, Han Bo-ra, who has subdued the arguing classmates, asks them.

"'Have you ever seen a child similar to me?

Jeong-woo decides to approach Bo-ra, who might be able to correct what is wrong...

---

description.ko:
같은 반 여자애에게 약점을 잡혀 괴롭힘 당하는 고등학생 '허정우'. 피폐한 나날을 보내던 정우의 반에 전학생 '한보라'가 온다. 까만 생머리와 다리에 얼룩을 가진 그 아이를 보고 정우는 강한 기시감을 느낀다. 아니나다를까, 시비 거는 반 아이들을
제압한 한보라는 그들에게 묻는다. '나랑 비슷한 애 본 적 있어?' 어쩌면 꼬인 것을 바로잡아줄 보라에게 정우는 접근하기로 하는데...

altTitles.es-la: Regreso del ranker de clase SSS

description.en:
What would you do with the chance to become far greater than your greatest rivals… before they could even start?

When a dominant guild gangs up on Rokan to humiliate him and destroy his hard-earned achievements in the world's most realistic fantasy VR game, he becomes desperate for revenge. But just when Rokan thinks he's lost it all, a twist in space-time sends him back to right before the game is even launched.

Now, this former SSS-class ranker sees the perfect opportunity to return to glory!
description.ko:
가상현실 게임 더 로드(The Lord)에서 최강자로 군림한 '폭력의 왕' 로칸.
적대 길드에서 내린 척살령으로 모든 것을 잃게 된다.
그런데, 자고 일어나니 3년 전 과거로 회귀했다!

"빌어먹을 자식들아, 기다려라. 모조리 씹어 먹어줄 테니까!"

과거로 회귀하여 다시 한 번 최강자로 군림하는 로칸의 이야기가 시작된다!
description.pt-br:
Lokan era o ‘Rei da Violência’ que reinou como o mais forte no jogo de realidade virtual, ‘The Lord’. Infelizmente, a ordem de assassinato emitida por uma guilda inimiga fez com que ele perdesse tudo. Para sua surpresa, da próxima vez que acordou, ele havia voltado três anos no tempo!

“Vermes do caralho, espere. Vou devorar todos vocês!”

Uma nova história começa quando Lokan, que viajou de volta no tempo, sobe de volta ao topo!

altTitles.ja: ここは鴨川ゲーム製作所

altTitles.zh: 这里是鸭川游戏制作所

description.en:
At his grandmother's vacant house, Yoh happened to find a picture he had drawn as a child.
The moment he saw the drawing, lightning struck his body and he was flooded with game ideas one after another.

Gather your friends and develop a game from scratch!
This is an awkward and endearing drama of adolescent boys and girls set in Kyoto.

altTitles.ja: ハンター×ハンター

description.en: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
description.fa:
هانتر‌ها، افراد کنجکاوی که به دنبال گنج‌ها، مجرم‌های خطرناک، مکان‌های ناشناخته و اسرارآمیز، جانوران افسانه‌ای و... هستند. البته برای دست یابی به این موقعیت نیاز به مجوزی است که در بین هر صدهزار نفر تنها یک نفر می‌تواند در آزمون آن موفق شود.
این داستان درمورد چهار نوجوانه که در آزمون هانترها با هم روبه‌رو می‌شوند:
گون، پسری که به دنبال پدرش می‌گردد. کیلوا، پسری که می‌خواهد زندگی جدیدی را شروع کند. لئوریو، پسری که قصد دارد پزشک شود و کوراپیکا، پسری که می‌خواهد انتقام قبیله خود‌ را بگیرد.
description.pt: Hunters são uma raça especial, dedicada a rastrear tesouros, animais mágicos, e até mesmo outros homens. Mas tais atividades requerem uma licença, e menos de um em cem mil pode passar no exame de qualificação esgotante. Aqueles que não passam tem acesso a áreas restritas, lojas de incríveis informações, bem como o direito de chamar-se de Hunters.
description.pt-br:
A série conta a história de Gon Freecss, um garoto de 12 anos que pretende se tornar um Hunter, um caçador de tesouros, lugares perdidos e criaturas estranhas.

Contudo, ao contrário da maioria dos Hunters que procuram fama e dinheiro, o herói da história tem uma motivação maior para querer ser um caçador – encontrar seu pai – um dos mais famosos hunters do mundo.

Mas não é qualquer um que pode se tornar um Hunter. Para poder praticar essa reconhecida profissão, é necessário ter uma licença especial – e para tirá-la é preciso passar – e sobreviver – a exames com milhares de inscritos. Uma vez aprovado e com sua licença Hunter em mãos, o caçador passa a ter direito a acessar áreas restritas, informações secretas e consegue acumular facilmente uma grande fortuna de acordo com seus feitos ? incluindo ir atrás de Hunters que usam seus poderes para objetivos escusos.
